text:
#COVID19 continues to pose a threat to public health. 

Governor @GavinNewsom signed an executive order to ensure all registered California voters will receive a mail-in ballot for the November election and will not have to risk their health to vote! 🗳 #YourActionsSaveLives https://t.co/8154tRBxKm
